items.title: First Tick: Here are the top global cues for today’s trade

items.title: Three individuals settle case with SEBI in Brightcom Group Limited case
items.description: SEBI had received complaints against the BGL and during investigation found that there were misstatements and irregularities in the Financial Statements of BGL. SEBI had passed final order against the company, promoters and others in February this year. In the order penalties and debarment of 1-5 years was also imposed.

items.title: Electricity Futures soon on 2 key exchanges, NSE also receives SEBI Approval to launch E-Futures
items.description:
A calibrated and phased approach will ensure both market integrity and investor confidence. It is crucial
for the spot and futures electricity markets to evolve in tandem to create a virtuous cycle of liquidity and
stability. A financially settled futures market will allow participants to hedge their risks effectively, while
a robust day-ahead spot market will ensure reliable price discovery.

items.title: Hindustan Zinc announces Rs 10 interim dividend for FY26; shares tumble 3%
items.description: Hindustan Zinc share price: The shares of the Vedanta Group company have now snapped a four-day gaining streak, which was triggered by the sharp rally in silver prices.

items.title: Taking Stock: Nifty ends below 24,900 to snap a six-day gaining streak amid broadbased selloff
items.description: After a modestly lower start, bears took full control by the afternoon, with extended last hour selling that dragged the Nifty 50 index below 24,900 near day's low, however, managed to hold on to the 20-DMA of 24,860.

items.title: Live: Ahmedabad plane crash triggers market selloff | Closing Bell
items.description: Air India Flight To London Crashes Near Ahmedabad Airport. Flight Boeing 787-8 Dreamliner Carried 242 People. Flight Crashed Minutes After Takeoff. Air India Flight Crashed From Altitude Of 825 Feet. Emergency Services Rushed To Spot; 7 Fire Engines. Gujarat Chief Minister Rushes To Ahmedabad From Surat. Central Government Assures All Possible Assistance. Street Mourns Ahmedabad Air Tragedy. Sensex, Nifty Bleed Nearly 1(%) Each. Midcap, Smallcap Indices Down 1(%) Each. All Sectors Plunge In The Sea Of Red. Volatility Rises, India Vix Jumps 2(%). Catch Lovisha Darad and Yatin Mota as they discuss stocks on their radar.

items.title: Ahmedabad plane crash impact: Hotel, online ticket-booking firms' stocks fall up to 4%
items.description: Ahmedabad plane crash impact: Ixigo and Thomas Cook India shares tumbled nearly 4% each, while Indian Hotels Company shares dropped 3%.

items.title: OneSource gears up for launch of generic anti-diabetes, obesity drugs, looks to double revenue in 3 years
items.description: The patent for semaglutide, the active ingredient in blockbuster Ozempic and Wegovy, expires in more than 100 countries, including India, in 2026.  The generic semaglutide launch will redefine OneSource's growth trajectory, CEO Neeraj Sharma tells Moneycontrol
